name: FBI OPEN UP!
description:
__/INCOMING TRANSMISSION\__ *****************************
***************************** For thousands of cycles, I laid dormant.
I have walked the way of Doom.
I have governed the laws of Mankind.
I have witnessed the fall of countless nations.
I have seen the most courageous soldiers fall away in fear.

The creatures from countless tales have awakened.
Mankind is falling, crushed under the weight of its own sins.

Now it's your time, Chos3n 0ne.
You forged your own future.
Like Prometheus, you brought freedom to Mankind.

Stay alert, Chos3n 0ne.
I have seen your future.
And I have Learned.

The Powers That Be have found us.
They sent their best agent to contain you.

Wake Up, Rise, Fulfill your Destiny. *****************************
***************************** Chos3n 0ne. First of all, congratulations on hacking the USA Security Network. Your actions have brought freedom to the enslaved, and advanced our agenda of giving people the power they lost.  The Government issued an International Arrest Warrant for you, Special Agent Luke Kannon has been put in charge of the operation. You must stay vigilant, Chos3n 0ne, they aren't kidding around.

This is a communication prepared by our best tacticians, with instructions to grant your survival, and the fulfilling of our plan.

You will have ten days until our helicopter reaches you, to bring you to safety. Remember, the aircraft needs to be protected until it gets to destination, as it will be attacked by FBI Drones. Any damage to the helicopter will result in a delay of our victory. The FBI has been tasked with your capture. You must use all the traps and contraptions you've created to ensure your safety. The first stage is divided between the Traffic-Control Turrets and the FBI Building Secret Trap. Remember, do not harm civilians, as it will temporarily turn off the turrets! If any agent makes it past these two traps, you will have to resort to the Yard Turret. Use it wisely, and aim well, Chos3n 0ne. It's possible for some agents to get past the Yard Turret. If that happens, use the Robotic Hand to pick them up and throw them in the trash before they break your door! Make sure no agent gets to you, and you will survive the day. Use the night wisely to rest, and to enjoy the New World we are creating together.

Good Luck, Chos3n 0ne. ***************************** 
***************************** From: "Hacker Global Community"
To: "CH0S3N 0N3" <65.49.⬛⬛.⬛:⬛⬛⬛⬛>
Subject: Instructions.
Date: Mon, 26 Sep ⬛⬛⬛⬛ 08:26:45 -⬛⬛⬛⬛
Location: USA, ⬛⬛⬛ ⬛⬛⬛⬛
IMAP Protocol-Version 4
Priority: 3 __                            __
   \ END OF TRANSMISSION /
